title: new client when i hit launch the game goes black and wont open
body: every time i get launch the game goes to a black screen and wont let me log in or go to the old client. please help?

replies.body: launch with --no-sandbox parameter. helped for me

This is a bug that happens if something went wrong during the upgrade. You can resolve it with the steps below:

> * Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends-AIR ONLY\RADS\system
* Open user.cfg with notepad
* Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
* Save and launch League of Legends again

Let me know if this worked for you! ^.^
